links.*: The Notion Club Papers Part Two
Lowdham's Report on the Adunaic Language

wikitext.*:
'''Andor''' or '''Yôzâyan''' in [[Adûnaic]],<ref>{{SD|2d}}, pp. 241, 247}}</ref> was a name for the island of [[Elenna]] or [[Númenor]], meaning 'The Land of Gift'.<ref>{{S|Akallabeth}}</ref> 

==Etymology==
The name is [[Quenya]] and contains the elements ''[[anna]]'' "gift" + ''[[dor]]'' "land".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}</ref>

Similarly, the native name Yôzâyan seems to contain the Adûnaic word '' zâyan'' "land".<ref>{{SD|3vi}}, p. 423</ref>
